src:
Povozil peško; avto zgorel
06 Nov 2019, 17:30 by B. B.
Ob 17.06 je na Cesti bratstva in enotnosti v Metliki osebno vozilo zbilo peško. Reševalci nujne medicinske pomoči ZD Metlika so jo oskrbeli v zdravstvenem domu.
Ob 16.47 je na Ljubljanski cesti v Ribnici na parkirišču zagorelo pod motornim pokrovom osebnega vozila. Požar so pričeli gasiti mimoidoči, gasilci PGD Ribnica pa so ga pogasili do konca in odklopili akumulator. Vozilo je uničeno.
text:
He drove on foot; car burned
06 Nov 2019, 17:30 by B.B.
At 17.06 on the Road of Fraternity and Unity in Metlika, a passenger car hit a pedestrian. Emergency medical service providers at the Metlika Medical Center provided it at a health center.
At 4.47pm, on the Ljubljana Road in Ribnica, a parking lot caught fire under the bonnet of a passenger car. The bystanders started to extinguish the fire and PGD Ribnica firefighters extinguished it completely and disconnected the battery. The vehicle is destroyed.
